forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 17C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 62F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Thunder possible. Low around 10C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Thunder possible. Low near 50F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain early. Windy with showers and perhaps a rumble of thunder developing late. Low near 10C. Winds SW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Thundershowers and wind following a period of rain early. Low near 50F. Winds SW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 49F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 63F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 48F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High around 65F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 50F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 19C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
